context: Analyze this arm balance pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Flying Pigeon (Eka Pada Galavasana) Advanced arm balance with leg hooked around arm. Consider the Upper body strength, hip flexibility, advanced balance. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.
